statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback
SELECT id, customer_name, payment_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE payment_rating > 3
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%'
SELECT customer_name, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE payment_rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, payment_rating, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_rating ASC;
SELECT id, customer_name, payment_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' AND payment_rating < 5 ORDER BY payment_rating DESC, id ASC;
SELECT customer_name FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_text IS NULL OR payment_rating >= 4 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE payment_rating = 5 AND feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT payment_amount FROM payment_rating WHERE payment_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_rating WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 50;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 3;
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_rating ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customers_feedback WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM service_issues WHERE resolved = false;
SELECT issue_description FROM service_issues WHERE issue_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM customers_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_amount >= 1000
SELECT feedback_text FROM customers_feedback WHERE LENGTH(feedback_text) > 50
SELECT issue_description, resolved FROM service_issues WHERE resolved = FALSE ORDER BY issue_id ASC
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM customers_feedback WHERE customer_id = 10
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, payment_rating, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE payment_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_ratings ORDER BY rating_value DESC;
SELECT customer_id, issue_description FROM payment_issues WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, resolution_text FROM resolved_issues ORDER BY resolved_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, payment_rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 5 ORDER BY payment_rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, rating_value FROM customer_ratings WHERE rating_value > 3;
SELECT * FROM payment_issues WHERE issue_description LIKE '%late payment%';
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback cf JOIN customer_ratings cr ON cf.customer_id = cr.customer_id WHERE cr.rating_value < 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, comment FROM PaymentFeedback WHERE rating < 2;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT payment_id, amount, currency, payment_date FROM PaymentDetails WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM IssueResolution WHERE resolved_by = 'John Doe' ORDER BY resolved_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerDetails WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, comment FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating < 3 AND created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT payment_method, amount, currency FROM PaymentDetails WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM IssueResolution WHERE resolution_text IS NOT NULL ORDER BY resolved_at ASC;
